summary: This tutorial covers JavainterfaceKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavainterfaceKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of JavainterfaceKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
